hero.title: AI Camp: Your First Campus Assistant
hero.description: AI Camp integrates rich AI features based on campus scenarios for students and teachers to use.

introduce.name: introduce
introduce.title: What is AI Camp
introduce.label: Introduction
introduce.description: AI Camp is an educational AI tools platform that provides teachers and students with rich AI teaching and learning resources.

items.title: Teaching Assistant Tools
items.description: Offers various AI teaching tools to help teachers improve lesson preparation efficiency, classroom teaching quality, and student assessment.

items.title: Learning Support Tools
items.description: Provides intelligent learning guidance for students, including knowledge explanations, practice exercises, and creativity inspiration.

items.title: Personalized Experience
items.description: Delivers personalized teaching and learning experiences based on AI technology, meeting the needs of different users.

benefit.name: benefit
benefit.title: Why Choose AI Camp
benefit.label: Benefits
benefit.description: Providing teachers and students with comprehensive intelligent learning experiences to enhance teaching and learning efficiency.

items.title: Intelligent Teaching Tools
items.description: Leveraging advanced AI technology to provide teachers with tools for quickly generating teaching resources, quizzes, and lesson plans.

items.title: Rich Learning Resources
items.description: Includes diverse learning tools, from knowledge analysis and concept explanations to interactive quizzes, meeting various learning needs.

items.title: Personalized Learning Paths
items.description: Automatically adjusts learning content and difficulty based on students' learning styles, interests, and progress, providing tailored learning experiences.

usage.name: usage
usage.title: How to Get Started with AI Camp
usage.description: Begin your intelligent teaching journey in just four simple steps:

items.title: Create an Account
items.description: Choose your role as a teacher or student, create your personal account, and start your AI education journey.

items.title: Explore Tool Library
items.description: Browse the wide range of AI education tools and select the ones that best fit your teaching or learning needs.

items.title: Generate Custom Content
items.description: Input your specific requirements, such as subject, grade level, or teaching theme to get personalized AI-generated content.

items.title: Apply and Share
items.description: Save, export, or directly share the generated content and apply it to your teaching or learning process.

feature.name: feature
feature.title: Key Features of AI Camp
feature.description: A comprehensive intelligent education platform for teachers and students.

items.title: Smart Lesson Planning
items.description: AI-powered generation of high-quality lesson plans and learning schedules that meet educational standards.

items.title: Intelligent Quiz Creation
items.description: One-click generation of diverse quiz formats with support for different difficulty levels and knowledge points.

items.title: Concept Explanations
items.description: Clear, accessible explanations of complex concepts to help students understand difficult topics more quickly.

items.title: Data-Driven Feedback
items.description: Analysis of student responses with personalized feedback and improvement suggestions to support learning growth.

items.title: Teaching Resource Library
items.description: Rich collection of teaching materials including presentations, charts, case studies, and interactive activities.

items.title: Multimodal Content Creation
items.description: Support for generating and editing educational content in multiple formats including text, images, and tables.

faq.name: faq
faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions About AI Camp
faq.description: Have another question? Contact us through our official channels or by email.

items.title: What is AI Camp and how does it help education?
items.description: AI Camp is an intelligent education platform designed for teachers and students. It uses advanced AI technology to create lesson plans, quizzes, and learning resources, helping teachers improve teaching efficiency and providing students with personalized learning experiences.

items.title: Do I need special technical skills to use AI Camp?
items.description: Not at all. AI Camp is designed to be intuitive and user-friendly. Whether you're an educational technology expert or a teacher just getting started with digital tools, you can easily get up and running. We provide detailed guides and quick-start tutorials.

items.title: What subjects and grade levels does AI Camp support?
items.description: AI Camp supports a wide range of subjects including mathematics, science, languages, history, geography, and more. The platform is suitable for students of all grades, from elementary school to higher education, with appropriate content and tools for each age group.

items.title: Can I customize the generated content?
items.description: Absolutely! AI Camp offers a high degree of customization. You can specify the subject, difficulty level, knowledge points, teaching objectives, and learning styles to generate content that best suits your needs and those of your students.

items.title: How accurate is the content generated by AI Camp?
items.description: AI Camp uses advanced training models and carefully curated educational resources to ensure that the generated content is accurate, relevant, and meets educational standards. However, we also encourage educators to review the content before use and provide feedback to continuously improve system quality.

items.title: How can I integrate AI Camp with my existing teaching methods?
items.description: AI Camp is designed to complement rather than replace traditional teaching. Teachers can use our tools to prepare course materials, customize assignments, create assessments, and provide personalized feedback, while maintaining the value of face-to-face instruction and the importance of personal guidance.
